post:
Dear forum friends,

As announced before, we have started 1st of "Nordic countries point of presence" in true VikingLayer spirit. We are happy to announce Sweden #1 in Stockholm hosted at [Portlane - Nacka Station data center.](http://www.portlane.com/en/infrastructure/nacka)

There is currently one node at operational state with dual X5675 CPUs and Hardware RAID 10 disk array accelerated with battery protected DDR Cache.

**New Viking Layer OpenVZ Sweden lineup:**

**Jarl**  
OpenVZ  
2 CPU Cores  
512 MB RAM  
1024 MB Burstable  
40 GB HDD  
500GB Traffic [AS42708](http://bgp.he.net/AS42708)  
1 Gbps Port Speed  
1 IPv4 and /64 IPv6 (operational in next week)  
ONLY 4 EUR per Month  
2 Months free on yearly payment  
**[ORDER HERE !!!](https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=40)**

**Warrior of Renown**  
OpenVZ  
4 CPU Cores  
1024 MB RAM  
2048 MB Burstable  
80 GB HDD  
1000GB Traffic [AS42708](http://bgp.he.net/AS42708)  
1 Gbps Port Speed  
1 IPv4 and /64 IPv6 (operational in next week)  
ONLY 6 EUR per Month  
2 Months free on yearly payment  
**[ORDER HERE !!!](https://vikinglayer.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=43)**

Thank you for your time
